title: Hardware Store Quiz
description: Do you know your way around a hardware store? Test your recall of common hardware items and supplies.

questions.question: What type of fastener has external threads and is driven with a wrench rather than a screwdriver?
Which hardware item is a U-shaped metal piece with threaded ends, used to hang pipes?
What is a toggle bolt used for?
options: Anchoring heavy items to hollow walls

questions.question: Which product is a flexible putty-like compound used to seal gaps around windows?
What does the abbreviation 'PVC' stand for in plumbing pipe materials?
Which hardware item is a flat, round disc placed under a nut or bolt head to distribute pressure?
What type of adhesive creates an extremely strong bond and typically comes in two parts that must be mixed?
Which item is a plastic insert placed into a drilled hole in drywall to hold a screw?
What is a pipe wrench specifically designed to grip?
Which type of sandpaper grit number indicates the coarsest surface?
What is plumber's tape (Teflon tape) used for?
options: Sealing threaded pipe connections to prevent leaks

questions.question: Which hardware store product is a thin, tapered piece of wood used to level surfaces?
What kind of saw blade is designed specifically for cutting metal?
Which product is used to fill nail holes and small imperfections in wood before painting?
What is a stud finder used for?
options: Locating wooden framing studs behind walls
